tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    sale_date TIMESTAMP,
    location_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE locations (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name STRING, city STRING, state STRING); CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name STRING, category STRING, unit_price DECIMAL); CREATE TABLE sales (sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT, location_id INT, sale_date DATE, quantity INT);

CREATE TABLE sales (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  sale_date DATE,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  quantity_available INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    stock_level INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE distribution_centers (
    dc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dc_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)
